system.effect: The energy attack burns away all of the hairs on the target's head, as well as leaving him reeling from the injury. The target suffers 2 levels of Fatigue and the target is Blinded for [[1d5]] rounds.

description.value:
Energy Damage to Head (Severity 4)

The energy attack burns away all of the hairs on the target's head, as well as leaving him reeling from the injury. The target suffers 2 levels of Fatigue and the target is Blinded for [[1d5]] rounds.
